The regulation shall provide procedures for transparent handling of all cases, including public availability of—

The regulation shall provide procedures to strengthen timely referral of cases, including the role of the agency remedy coordination official (as required in

The regulation shall provide procedures to ensure consistent standards and procedures that treat all alleged violators fairly and expeditiously, including small businesses with limited legal resources.
The regulation shall provide procedures to strengthen the identification and referral (for suspension or debarment consideration) of contractors and grantees that repeatedly fail to perform.

The regulation shall provide procedures for an expedited review process to handle contract or grant fraud in a non-traditional or time-sensitive environment, either in a military or non-military setting.
